item id [id]: 404
armor id [armor]: 98 (Robe of the Sorceress)
protection, body [protbody]: 16
magic bonus [boosters]: +SDNB

Item cannot be forged.

This robe of woven metal was enchanted by the sorceress Satina to increase her sorcerous powers and protect her from harm.
